description:
5G speed. A14 Bionic, the fastest chip in a smartphone.
An edge-to-edge OLED display. Ceramic Shield with four times better drop performance. And Night mode on every camera. iPhone 12 has it all — in two perfect sizes.
name: iPhone 12

description: he iPhone 11 succeeds the iPhone XR, and it features a 6.1-inch LCD display that Apple calls a "Liquid Retina HD Display." It features a 1792 x 828 resolution at 326ppi, a 1400:1 contrast ratio, 625 nits max brightness, True Tone support for adjusting the white balance to the ambient lighting
name: iPhone 11

description: iPhone SE packs our powerful A13 Bionic chip into our most popular size at our most affordable price. It’s just what you’ve been waiting for.
name: iPhone SE

description: Mi 11 is made for movie lovers. Xiaomi has combined exceptional hardware with cutting edge cinematic software,  to offer a variety of incredibly creative yet easy-to-use videography features.
name: Mi 11

description: Supports AdaptiveSync in 30Hz-120Hz, automatically matches content with the best refresh rate to provide smooth experience and optimize power consumption
name: Mi 10T Lite

description: The Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ 678 Mobile Platform is designed to deliver reliable performance for dynamic entertainment experiences. A boost in both CPU and GPU provides improved gaming, photography, streaming, and more. Experience it all at high speed with impressive connectivity.
name: Redmi Note 10
